info.title: Asset registry API
info.description:
This is the AgStack asset registry API. It is used for registering an asset (i.e, typically a polygon but is can be any geo-spatial geometry) and receive a 256-byte/16-Char alphanumeric unique ID for it
.

tags.name: authenticated
tags.description: Operations available to everyone with an access key

get.description:
* To define a new polygon or find a very closely matching polygon (omit inclusion and overlap, create=1)
* To find an existing polygon, but not create a new one (omit inclusion and overlap, create=0)
* To find existing polygons that completely contain the query polygon with only minor exceptions, but which are no more than 100 times larger than the query (set overlap near 1, set inclusion to 0.01, create=0)

parameters.name: bound
parameters.description: Well-known text (WKT) for the Polygon to be identified eg, from shapely.Polygon.to_wkt()

parameters.name: inclusion
parameters.description: The area of the intersection divided by the area of the result polygon will be at least this large. Default is 0.9

parameters.name: overlap
parameters.description: The area of the intersection of the result and query divided by the area of the query polygon will be at least this large. Default is 0.9

parameters.name: create
parameters.description: If no matching polygon is found, a new polygon will be registered if create=1

parameters.name: includeAutocreated
parameters.description: Include all autocreated polygons (using machine learning)

parameters.name: includeS2Indices
parameters.description: Include all autocreated polygons (using machine learning)

geoid.description: 24 hexit string. The geo-identifier for an overlapping region

intersection.description: The area intersection divided by the area of the union or result and query polygons

inclusion.description: The area of the intersection divided by the area of the result polygon

overlap.description: The area intersection divided by the area of query polygon

get.summary: Get an asset boundary with its geoid

parameters.name: geoid
parameters.description: A 24 hexit string. The identifier for an overlapping region.

parameters.name: includeS2Indices
parameters.description: Include the S2 indices (list of Level 20, Level 19, Level 15. Level 8 and level 5) of all the indices that intersect the assetid

geoid.description: 24 hexit string. The geo-identifier for an overlapping region

meta-data.description: Dictionary of key-value pairs that are optionally posted by the creator (if they exist)

get.summary: Get a list of asset boundaries from a latitude and longitude point
get.description: Get a list of asset boundaries whose boundaries contain the latitude and longitude Point

parameters.name: includeAutocreated
parameters.description: Include all autocreated polygons (using machine learning)

parameters.name: includeS2Indices
parameters.description: Include the S2 indices (list of Level 20, Level 19, Level 15. Level 8 and level 5) of all the indices that intersect the assetid

200.description: GeoJSON payload with a list of key-value pairs

get.summary: Get a list of asset boundaries from an Area of Interest
get.description: Get a list of asset boundaries whose boundaries are included inside the Area of Interest (AOI)

parameters.name: OAI
parameters.description: The GeoJSON in a string (wkt) format of the area of interest (e.g., a watershed or a state) . WGS84 projection / EPSG 4326

parameters.name: includeAutocreated
parameters.description: Include all autocreated polygons (using machine learning)

parameters.name: includeS2Indices
parameters.description: Include the S2 indices (list of Level 20, Level 19, Level 15. Level 8 and level 5) of all the indices that intersect the assetid

200.description: GeoJSON payload with a list of key-value pairs

get.summary: Add optional metadata about a registered polygon
get.description:
* To define and post optional metadata about a registered polygon
* Implemented as an OrderedDict datatype so that flexible ontologies can be posted.
* Date and public credentials will be uniform
* Multiple users can post to a polygon, but the date and credentials will enable ease of selection by users

accessKey.name: accessKey
accessKey.description: The identifier of the workload making the request

signature.name: signature
signature.description: The hash of the arguments excluding the signature keyed with the private key associated with the access key.

index.description: The item number on the list

geoid.description: A 24 hexit string. Geoid of this asset in the list
